column3: Latest;PHNOM PENH------â€“ A Vietnamese woman was found dead at 11:35 am on December 14
column6: Phnom Penh.------The victim was named as Nguyen Thi Minh Hanh
column7: a 26-year-old who was staying at De Brid Hotel (*The Bridge Club?).------Following the incident
column8: a doctor at the Phnom Penh Municipal Court
column9: concluded that the victim had died of heart failure following a methamphetamine overdose.------Another source says that the woman had been in Cambodia for 3 days and was feeling unwell. Instead of going to the hospital
column10: she asked friends to drive her to Wat Chamkamon
column12: and was left in the pagoda by her friends.------The body was taken to Stung Meanchey pagoda.
